title: Feinting Attack
content:
einting Attack is a Passive Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Feinting Attack works with a Superiority Dice to fuel it. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may vary greatly, from allowing you to equip certain Weapons or pieces of Armor with Proficiency, to add your Proficiency Bonus to certain Saving Throws.

Feinting Attack Information

You can use both your action and bonus action on a turn to attack a target with Advantage and
